segments.text: I see by your resume that you have just graduated from college . I assume you haven't had any working experience . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . I've only had some part-time jobs working in department stores .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , experience is not important in this job . We are looking for a man we can train to be a teller . By the way , do you like to work with figures ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I liked math in school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are more interested in finding someone who is alert and quick at figures . Do you like meeting the public ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I enjoy working with people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have very pleasant working conditions and I think we have a fine staff to work with . You would be assigned an experienced employee to help you . He would be responsible for training you . Have you studied English conversation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I had an American tutor for two years . I had two lessons under her every week . Would I be using English every day is this job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , many of our customers are Americans , so you would be speaking English with most of them . Do you know anything about various kinds of savings and checking accounts ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm afraid I don't . I'd be glad to learn .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good answer . I appreciate your being frank .
segments.speaker: S1
